QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Netherstorm!
QuestData.Description: The goblins of Area 52 in Netherstorm have called for assistance from any able bodied champions willing to provide them the support they need in their endevours.$b$bThe Warchief feels their position and aid in the region will provide a tactical advantage against the nearby forces of Kael'thas.$b$bArea 52 can be reached by following the northeastern road of Blade's Edge Mountains until you see the world crumbling away into the Twisting Nether.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Rocket-Chief Fuselage at Area 52.
